h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: When attacking him from the front, be ready to deal with backhanded sweeps along the ground that you can parry with Rock Solid, or dodge and keep your combo going. However, if he stands up and pulls one arm back, you can expect a surprisingly far-reaching and fast lunging punch, followed by a slam into the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
When attacking him from the front, be ready to deal with backhanded sweeps along the ground that you can parry with Rock Solid, or dodge and keep your combo going. However, if he stands up and pulls one arm back, you can expect a surprisingly far-reaching and fast lunging punch, followed by a slam into the ground.
